original_text: He shall take the live bird with the cedarwood and the scarlet yarn and the hyssop, and dip them and the live bird in the blood of the bird that was killed over the fresh water.
korean_text: 다른 새는 산 채로 가져다가 백향목과 홍색 실과 우슬초와 함께 가져다가 흐르는 물 위에서 잡은 새의 피를 찍어

sentences.original_text: He shall take the live bird with the cedarwood
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 백향목과 함께 산 새를 가져가고

sentences.original_text: and the scarlet yarn and the hyssop,
and dip them and the live bird
in the blood of the bird
that was killed over the fresh water.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 새는 생수 위에서 죽인 것이다.
